product_name: 100 Trails of the Big South Fork - Tennessee and Kentucky - Fourth Edition
long_description: The completely updated guide covers all the trails of the Big South Fork plus adjacent national forests and areas. Manning, Russ. Softcover; 208 pages; 38 black and white photos, 14 maps. The Mountaineers Books; copyright 2000. Trails for hikers, mountain bikers, and horseback riders are clearly identified and practical information about each trail is also included.
short_description: The completely updated guide covers all the trails of the Big South Fork plus adjacent national forests and areas.
